Reviews.Content: EDITED This is a great camera and I really enjoy using it. It is fantastic for so many different things, and the only downside is it's bad zoom, but that can easily be looked over.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Antonina Farina
Reviews.Content: camera works and looks great. I haven't put it through the tortures that they say it can go through, but it is great.

Reviews.Title: arrived busted
Reviews.Author: magoo
Reviews.Content: im sure this is a great camera{owned several of its predecessors}. although it arrived quick enough i never got to use it because it arrived busted. had to rely on a previous model for the trip. returned the camera just fine and got a refund. will try again, maybe from different vendor this time.

Reviews.Title: Slow response, different interface
Reviews.Author: Donald Willingham
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera, but I have three complaints: nonstandard cable, slow response, and the interface is just different from what I'm used to.  Why couldn't they use the same micro usb cable as almost every new cellphone except iphone?  I do like the ability to charge over usb, so I don't have to remove the battery to charge it.  I would expect a new camera to be a little more responsive.  My last two digital camera were Canon (sd750 and sd100), and the interface is just different.  I didn't expect it to be the same, but I had to learn something new.  The camera has been submerged in the pool mostly, but in the ocean twice, and it's holding up just fine.

Reviews.Title: Fine Machine, But...
Reviews.Author: Observer7
Reviews.Content: Top quality camera. Built solid and easy to use. Pictures are great. But two issues make this a nine instead of a ten. 1st. battery running time seems somewhat less than standard for this size camera. And 2nd. LCD blackout between shots takes longer than others i have experienced. Still this is a keeper.... at least for my purposes.

Reviews.Title: Its Easy to use and is Tough as its name implies.
Reviews.Author: R. Eric Wallien "greatfull gardener"
Reviews.Content: So far so good. It was a snap to set up and is really easy to use.I cant wait to take some underwater shots!

Reviews.Title: No worries
Reviews.Author: Marko
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I have no worries when I use it.  I have dropped it so many times (on concrete, ceramic tile, in the water, mud, snow, you name it).  I have sat on it, played in the snow with it, snorkeled in the Florida Keys with it, swam in the pool with it, went down water slides with it, went on roller-coasters with it, and of course I have just taken regular pictures with it.  This thing seems indestructible.  I never worry about breaking it or taking a bad picture with it.  The quality of pictures look great to me.  They are vivid, clear, and focused.  The video is standard definition, 30 fps.  It is not the same quality video that you can take with a video camera, but it does the trick.  Then again, I wouldn't take my video camera down a waterslide...

Reviews.Title: Tough little camera!  Works on all the water rides.
Reviews.Author: C. Yount
Reviews.Content: I've never owned a Digital point & shoot.  This one is great around kids. It can take getting bounced around and soaked by water rides at an amusement park. I would recommend buying a second battery though, the camera died after 4 hours of video shooting and pictures.

Reviews.Title: At least for me, terrible auto focus.
Reviews.Author: D. Herdegen
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this camera, only to be disappointed by the picture quality. Perhaps it was just me, but the auto focus was very unreliable. It just couldn't lock on to what I wanted focused. Sorry, but I've owned many digital cameras, and this was the worst of the lot in terms of focusing. On those rare occasions when it did focus properly, the pictures were fine.After several fruitless days of effort, I sold it on eBay at a loss.My first and last Olympus.

Reviews.Title: I was so dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Bee
Reviews.Content: I have an old Stylus 1030s something.. and its worked great.  First, I saw the Styblus 8010 came out and i was so excited to upgrade.  Which I did and was so dissapointed.  Its 14mp and it's blurry, foggy, grainy.  I tried iAuto too, and it just not focus as the old Stylus 1030.  The buttons are small and hard to press on, especial the zoom-in buttons... and way too expensive if it's doesn't work that great.I always like Olympus, maybe I may have to try someting else.

Reviews.Title: Nice Photos but camera is defective
Reviews.Author: Lucille Deperro "vagabond"
Reviews.Content: I have owned three Olympus Digital Point and Shoot Cameras in the past.  I have owned three Casio Digital Point and Shoot cameras. I just purchased this camera because of my boss's recommendation.  He purchased his at BEST BUY.  I purchased mine from AMAZON - since I am pretty loyal to AMAZON.COM.  When I received the camera - the on/off button was not flush nor raised from the camera body. It was difficult to press. I did not question it - however, it is very, very difficult to turn this camera on and off.  I am not sure if I was sold a defective camera or if this is how the camera is designed. Owners please let me know! However, yesterday I wanted to take a few photos and could not open the camera.  It's brand new ... and no one has used it but me.  I keep the camera in a hard case and there is no reason for this to be happening.  Is this a defect in design or is this just a defective camera?  Please let me know if you have the same issue. I will be returning this to Amazon.com.  Unfortunate, since the photos I took do not look that great on the camera LCD monitor but once you upload them to your laptop, pc, iPad or project them - they are terrific! I will return it for a new one. Amazon...think I have a lemon!

Reviews.Title: bueno...
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: es lo que esperaba...mejora las versiones anteriores y pretende evitar problemas de los modelos anteriores pero aún tienen mucho por mejorar.pero para la función que cumple está perfecto.

Reviews.Title: Avoid it like the plague
Reviews.Author: Homa Karimabadi "rocketman"
Reviews.Content: This camera does not work under water. The first time I took it under water it leaked. I sent it in for repairs.  Next time I took it in water it leaked immediately. I sent it for repair a second time. This went on a third time at which point they claimed that they had sent me a new one. Well, the new one leaked too! I called to ask for a refund. They said the only option is to send it for repair but the fact that it was over 6 months from the last repair, I would have to pay for it.  What a waste of money.  If you want to be able to take pictures under water, either a camera with a housing component or one of those disposable types.I am never buying an Olympus again.

Reviews.Title: Waterproofing doesn't work when screws come loose
Reviews.Author: Marsseen
Reviews.Content: Camera was great and sturdy through thick and thin... until it wasn't. I took it in a swimming pool and it stopped working all of a sudden. Upon further inspection, one of the screws on the front of the camera came loose, water got in and POOF! No more working camera. I looked online, and it didn't look like Olympus backed the product for water damage, so i didn't try to return it (it was also over a year old, so therefore out of the warranty period), but nevertheless, i think its a design flaw that will keep me from buying another one. I'm going to try the sony or the panasonic underwater point and shoot instead.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: coolguyfo
Reviews.Content: Not sure what happened with the mail but the camera just got here. I am sorry for the frustration, hope you understand. Camera is in great shape, new condition. Takes excellent pictures and is exactly  what I expected, even better including the lost hope I had. Thank you for a great camera and accessories.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Performance but very pretty camera
Reviews.Author: Brian Helfeldt
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for speed Do Not Buy! I bought this camera and I had such high hopes for it but to be honest the performance is like a 10.00 camera at the drug store. I took about 75 pictures and they all seemed to soft or to much noise and yes I tried every setting on there. I really love the layout of this camera and the looks are just stunning but I just couln't get passed the bad pictures. So it's just personal I guess. I'm going to try out the Pentex W90 now. PS I own a DSLR and a Canon SD1200Thanks,Brian

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Stephen A. Jaggers "Steve"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas gift, so I really can't say a lot one way or the other.  I researched on the Olympus web site and decided this was the best buy for the person.  Amazon beat all the prices I found.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a wedding gift for my husband.  It is an awesome camera and we can't wait to begin really using it!

Reviews.Title: memory card
Reviews.Author: Bruce E. Wolbrette "drivergolf"
Reviews.Content: Do not get the xD card for the Olympus Stylus Tough 8010.  It uses an SD card and has a 2 GB internal memory.

Reviews.Title: You Gotta be Kidding Me
Reviews.Author: wenaldo "luppier"
Reviews.Content: Really Olympus. I bought your camera, and it comes with no charger, no manual, and no memory card. I will give you the card and the charger, but trying to charge me $10 to send a manual so I can learn how to use it. Ya gotta be kidding right? Absolutely not. $10 for a manual, or sit on the phone for hours to ask questions. How they figure this is more productive than including a manual is beyond me. There is a reason ther is an hour wait. I don't even know if the camera is any good cause I can't use anything but the simple functions without a manual. I actually took a picture, but can't view it! Movies forget it, flash maybe it has one, I can't find it.  If for no other reason, this camera is going back because of the rudeness of Olympus. I have had to ask for the manual before from other cheap companies, but not been charged. Yes Olympus I want to print out 100 pages with my printer so you can pretend you are green, all the while I am using thrice the paper you would, and still not satisfied with a clumsy loose leaf manual. If I did print it out, I would need to carry around a full 9 x11 book instead of one that fit in the camera case. Duh!!!!!!!! Be mindful people, is this the kind of company you want to deal with??????????????

Reviews.Title: Olympus Style SUCKS DON"T BUY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shelley Jones "DC"
Reviews.Content: I have the Olympus Style770SW for two years and it has already broken due to water.  Olympus has the worst customer service I have ever seen.  They take forever to respond, they hang up, they honestly don't even care that their product has horrible performance and breaks in the water. They quote the product as being indestructible yet it is already broken.NEVER BUY THIS PRODUCT as the pictures suck as well, try taking any night pictures and they won't come out.
